response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $120 for this product. This offer not only reflects its true value but also provides you with an opportunity to secure it at a slightly higher yet reasonable cost compared to the market. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 120}
